As a business development manager, I am responsible for over-seeing the
end-to-end Sales process for Techverx across various channels and supervise
the daily activities and performance management of individual BDRs/SDRs to
ensure key performance metrics are met.
During my Initial days as a BDM, I performed the following key activities:
• Revamped the entire sales process and team structure.
• Designed and Structured Outbound Sales Engine.
• Introduced new and various sales strategies and tools.
